import React, { Component } from 'react' import Solidlotion from './images/Solidlotion.jpg' import bodyWash from './images/bodyWash.jpg' import bodyScrub from './images/bodyScrub.jpg' import FM from './images/FaceMask.jpg' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartActions' class ArrivalsCard extends Component { render(){ return (
{/* FIRST ROW */}
Solid Lotion

$10.00

Body Wash

$8.00

{/* SECOND ROW */}
Face Mask

$7.00

Body Scrub

$12.00

Previous Next
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state)=>{ return { items: state.items } } const mapDispatchToProps= (dispatch)=>{ return{ addToCart: (id)=>{dispatch(addToCart(id))} } } export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ArrivalsCard)
